channel.title: +Light on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in +Light on Vishvas's notes

item.title: Bulbs
item.description: Metrics Lumens/Watt - 100 is best. 75 is average. LED life in hours Power factor/ efficiency. Smart bulbs - color range, brightness adjustment Socket types B22 - two contacts on the side. Popular in India. E27 - screwed bulb type. contacts on side and back. Popular in USA.
